3B001 Equipment for the manufacturing of semiconductor devices, materials, or related equipment, as follows (see List of Items Controlled) and “specially designed” “components” and “accessories” therefor.
Semiconductor manufacturing deposition equipment, as follows:
Equipment or systems designed for multistep processing in multiple chambers or stations, as follows:

structure.heading: Equipment designed to fabricate a metal contact by performing all of the following processes:
structure.label: 3B001.d.4.a – Equipment designed to fabricate a metal contact by performing all of the following processes:

children.heading: Surface treatment plasma process using hydrogen (H2), including hydrogen and nitrogen (H2 + N2) or ammonia (NH3), while maintaining the wafer substrate at a temperature greater than 100 °C and less than 500 °C;
children.label: 3B001.d.4.a.1 – Surface treatment plasma process using hydrogen (H2), including hydrogen and nitrogen (H2 + N2) or ammonia (NH3), while maintaining the wafer substrate at a temperature greater than 100 °C and less than 500 °C;

children.heading: Surface treatment plasma process using oxygen (O2) or ozone (O3), while maintaining the wafer substrate at a temperature greater than 40 °C and less than 500 °C; and
children.label: 3B001.d.4.a.2 – Surface treatment plasma process using oxygen (O2) or ozone (O3), while maintaining the wafer substrate at a temperature greater than 40 °C and less than 500 °C; and
